# ignore hex colors
(?:[\\0][xX]|\\u|[uU]\+|#x?|\%23)[0-9a-fA-FgGrR_]{2,}(?:[uUlL]{0,3}|u\d+)\b

# ignore tag's in jsx
^(<[a-zA-Z0-9]*?) \b

# ignore file paths
^((\.\./|[a-zA-Z0-9_/\-\\])*\.[a-zA-Z0-9]+)\b

# ignore imports
import(?:["'\s]*([\w*{}\n, ]+)from\s*)?["'\s]*([@\w/_-]+)["'\s]*;?\b

# ignore URL's
https?:\/\/(www\.)?[-a-zA-Z0-9@:%._\+~#=]{1,256}\.[a-zA-Z0-9()]{1,6}\b([-a-zA-Z0-9()@:%_\+.~#?&//=]*)\b
